author: AAA3A
name: DisurlVotesTracker
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. If you enjoy my work, please consider donating on [Buy Me a Coffee](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aaa3a>) or [Ko-Fi](<https://ko-fi.com/aaa3a>)!
You have to install [Red-Dashboard](https://red-web-dashboard.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to use this cog!
short: Track votes on Disurl, assign roles to voters and remind them to vote!
description: Track votes on Disurl, assign roles to voters and remind them to vote!
end_user_data_statement: This cog records the timestamps of each member vote for a server for which the cog is configured.
